episodes.title: Lauren Salzman's Extraordinary NXIVM Sentencing Hearing
episodes.description: Roberta Glass gives her listeners the inside scoop on what happened at Lauren Salzman's sentencing on July 28, 2021. Lauren Salzman plead guilty to two counts of racketeering in March 2019. She was the star witness for the Government in NXIVM cult leader, Keith Raniere's trial. Both the Government and the defendant were asking the Judge for a lenient sentence. The Roberta Glass True Crime Report is produced by Ati Abdo MacDonald Many thanks to Tuesday Money and all the Patreon supportersThis show is part of the Spreaker Prime Network, if you are interested in advertising on this podcast, contact us at https://www.spreaker.com/show/2774335/advertisement

episodes.title: Inside the NXIVM Cult: Starvation, Secrets & Sex Slaves, Sarah Berman's New Book Exposes Keith Raniere's Secret Plan to Rule Us All.
episodes.description: Author Sarah Berman joins Roberta to talk about her new book "Don't Call It A Cult" which chronicles the history of the NXIVM cult. Berman lays out why the cult's tactics and techniques was so powerful and destructive. Sarah also reveals how Raniere's thirst for power didn't end with his total control over his cult devotee's minds, finances and bodies; his real plan was to rule us all. Don't Call It A Cult is published by Steerforth Press and is available everywhere books are sold. The Roberta Glass True Crime Report is produced by Ati Abdo MacDonaldIntro by Tuesday Money of the Elephant Lounge Podcast Many thanks to the Patrons of the Roberta Glass True Crime Report.This show is part of the Spreaker Prime Network, if you are interested in advertising on this podcast, contact us at https://www.spreaker.com/show/2774335/advertisement

episodes.title: NXIVM Whistleblower Speaks!
episodes.description: Maayan Tuati Saraga is the most important NXIVM whistleblower you have never heard of. Saraga started taking NXIVM's Executive Sucess Program in Mexico in 2013 but left in 2015 because no one in the program was acheiving the results promised. When she heard about how and why Mark Vincente left NXIVM, Saraga became a tireless researcher of the cult. Her research was utilized by the FBI and Eastern District of New York's District Attorney's offiice in convicting Keith Raniere. Keith Raniere was sentenced to one hundred and twenty years in prison this week. The Roberta Glass True Crime Report is produced by Ati Abdo MacDonald.This show is part of the Spreaker Prime Network, if you are interested in advertising on this podcast, contact us at https://www.spreaker.com/show/2774335/advertisement

episodes.title: Justice is Served! Keith Raniere Gets 120 Year Sentence!
episodes.description: I watched Keith Raniere get sentenced in the Brooklyn Federal Courthouse to 120 years in prison surrounded by NXIVM cult members. It was a weird and wonderful day. This episode is dedicated to the brave survivors of NXIVM and Keith Raniere.
